briefdescription.para: L2 Route Types that can be programmed by client.
Error - ErrStatus field elaborates on the error.

detaileddescription.para: The client can decide to close the stream based on the error.
NotifStatus field elaborates on the result If the GetNotifMsg is per-BD and there was an error, only the notification for the BD in the status message is not setup.

briefdescription.para: Start marker - sent before any notification is sent.

detaileddescription.para: This is an indication to stale any objects received until now.

briefdescription.para: End marker for BD configuration notifications.

detaileddescription.para: This is an indication to sweep any staled BD states if present.
This is an indication to sweep any staled routes if present.

briefdescription.para: Server RPC proto file for L2 routes.
